channel.description: Recent content in glue on Sanchit's blog

item.title: Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew
item.description: Transform Data with AWS Glue DataBrew Overview We all are fascinated with various analytical outcomes like different kinds of visualization. But do we know that 50% of the time is just spent cleansing, understanding, & exploring your data? Also, it is a combustion process, multiple iterations, time-consuming, etc.? AWS launched the Glue DataBrew service to focus more on the business use-case and simplify the preparation activities. This session will focus on the Introduction of the Databrew service, different functionality, followed by a quick demo

item.title: Catalog Data using AWS Glue Data Catalog ðŸ“–
item.description: Introduction Glue Data Catalog is an AWS native service that allows persisting, tag, and extends metadata in a similar fashion like an Apache Hive metastore. Every AWS account holds one AWS Glue Data Catalog in every region. It offers a consistent store where multiple sources can persist and lookup metadata to organize the data and leverage it to query and transform the data. Following are the additional extensions to Glue Data Catalog:
